0.title: About
0.content: This is the base Jekyll theme. You can find out more info about customizing your Jekyll theme, as well as basic Jekyll usage documentation at jekyllrb.com . You can find the source code for Minima at GitHub: jekyll / minima . You can find the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll / jekyll .

4.doc: Collectie van de Gentenaar: Gentse rol van het wc
4.title: Build it yourself
4.content: underneath physical construct you can find : . | the Fusion360 model (parameterized for plate thickness) | lasercut files (plate thickness 3.8mm, create new lasercut files via the fusion360 model) | the 3D print models | . BOM: . | Raspberry Pi 4B . | with power supply | with SC card | Raspberry pi Camera V3 | . | Axidraw mini kit 2 | Adafruit DC stepper hat | 2x Nema17 stepper | bolts and nuts | light bulb E14 | light bulb fixation | LCD Keypat hat | large fan (to be defined) | markers . | I used children’s markers, as they have a soft tip, useful for toilet paper and they don’t dry out. Saves some headaches and running around. | . | .

5.doc: Collectie van de Gentenaar: Gentse rol van het wc
5.title: Collectie van de Gentenaar: Gentse rol van het wc
5.content: Bringin heritage closer to the people. An installation interpreting images from Collectie van de Gentenaar. The installation places images on a unique timeline, where each image is semantically connected one way or the other. This timeline is then printed on toilet paper. That’s about as close as it gets to the people.

6.title: Process
6.content: . | getting the data and preparing it | insert paper roll | paper gets sucked down with the fan | two steppers to roll off the paper | when to stop rolling? Camera + notches + light to the rescue | drawing via axidraw mini | drawing with markers on toilet paper: the good, the bad & a lot of uglyness | the physical setup: lasercut + 3D print | .

10.title: two steppers to roll off the paper
10.content: . | notice: had to sand of all hard corners & align the height of all different parts, so the corner the paper took was not too steep. otherwise the paper would get torn apart. | .

13.title: drawing + markers +  toilet paper
13.content: . | fonts: single line fonts necessary | ink flows: need to take into account not using small text | markers: need soft tips (not tearing the paper) + | .
